summary: "Death of a Salesman" is a famous play by Arthur Miller, first shown in 1949. It tells the sad story of Willy Loman, an aging salesman who is unhappy with his life and struggles with his memory. The play explores themes like the American Dream and truth. It won important awards and is thought to be one of the best plays of the 20th century. It has been performed many times and made into several movies.
title: Death of a Salesman
